name: copilot-desktop
description: Unofficial GUI for GitHub's Copilot, made in Electron.

scripts.build:linux: echo 'Linux build disabled due to icon requirements'
scripts.package:win: electron-packager . Copilot-Desktop --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --icon=src/icon.ico --out=dist --overwrite && cd dist && powershell Compress-Archive -Path Copilot-Desktop-win32-x64/* -DestinationPath Copilot-Desktop-win.zip && cd ..
scripts.package:linux: electron-packager . Copilot-Desktop --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=src/icon.ico --out=dist --overwrite && cd dist && zip -r Copilot-Desktop-linux.zip Copilot-Desktop-linux-x64 && cd ..
scripts.package:mac:x64: electron-packager . Copilot-Desktop --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --icon=src/icon.ico --out=dist --overwrite && cd dist && zip -r Copilot-Desktop-macos-x64.zip Copilot-Desktop-darwin-x64 && cd ..
scripts.package:mac:arm64: electron-packager . Copilot-Desktop --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 --icon=src/icon.ico --out=dist --overwrite && cd dist && zip -r Copilot-Desktop-macos-arm64.zip Copilot-Desktop-darwin-arm64 && cd ..
